item.title: Dbl Check - Relaunch
item.description:
Dbl Check Relaunch

Dbl Check is out (again)! It’s free on the Chrome Webstore with three “checks” a day for the time being. I got mixed up on how the Chrome Webstore works so I had to take it down, put it up, take it down again, etc.

I’ll work on some more features and increase the limit of three but I’m calling this the official launch.

https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/dbl-check/labkdeadaiekmeajaiknljnjpockolfj
